description: This file defines a React component for a crossword creator and solver web application, including UI components, state management, puzzle creation, solving logic, and user authentication (local implementation).

methods.name: startSolving
methods.description: Initializes the solving session for a selected puzzle, resetting solving state, timer, and marking the puzzle as unsolved.

methods.name: handleAuth
methods.description: Handles user login or registration by updating local user state and storage.

methods.name: handleCreatePuzzle
methods.description: Adds a newly created puzzle to the puzzles list.

methods.name: checkSolution
methods.description: Validates if the current solving state matches the puzzle's solution grid.

methods.name: revealSolution
methods.description: Reveals the correct solution on the current puzzle, updating the solving state and marking as solved.
